ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine catches a whiff of the air, smoke and mech fluid all around, it was as he feared, he d arrived just in time to clean up the damages, he rolled out

Lunarpine catches a whiff of the air, smoke and mech fluid all 
around, it was as he feared, he'd arrived just in time to clean up 
the damages, he rolled out from behind the rock formation 
transforming to wolf mode, he caught a couple familiar scents and 
hesitated, only to be rudely brought back to reality by some stray 
fire.quickly he ran toward the scents knowing full well his 
vulnerability in wolf mode, as he got closer he transformed back, 
drew his rifle and fired in the direction of the nearest unknown 
(Ares)

Claws flip to his wrists, his rifle set on full, his eyes red with 
mechfluid lust (Bloodlust), and his teeth drooling for the taste of 
death.He didn't see Ramhorn making his move till it was too late, at 
that point he didn't care as long as he hit his target.

"GRRRRRRRRRR" was all that was sent over his comlink as he fired,he 
didn't see Shadow Wing or Prowl and that worried him. He'd made a 
promise to protect Shadow Wings spark, he'd hoped he didn't fail her 
already.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus/Ramhorn/Smokescreen::
> 
> Prowl rolls out of the way of most of Ares' shots, ending up behind 
a 
> boulder, near Ramhorn. He motions for Ramhorn to give him a charge, 
which the 
> fellow Maximal does. Prowl jumps out from behind the boulder, 
throwing the 
> charge at Ares.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen ducks, the shots going over his head. He brings his 
fist up as 
> Serpentor's jump brings him closer, punching at Serpentor's chest.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus rolls to the left, a shot hitting his leg. The ram aims his 
gun, 
> firing at Shuko.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker bring his arm up, Hades' claws and teeth hitting it. With 
his other 
> hand, the Maximal stabs his sword at Hades' chest.
